Judul: THE ROLE OF SOCIAL AGENT IN CORPORATE SOCIAL RESPONSIBILITY PROGRAM
Abstrak: Corporate, government and community need social agent to be partner to implement their social activity. Social agent is an individual who becomes the linkage between the parties with the other one that has a social require. In this study the social agents that object is KA. So the research will research how the KA act and correlation with other parties. In this study used qualitative methods. Search data is done by way of interviews with those who came from representatives of companies, governments and organizations and also observed a program that has been conducted and other evidence.
Kata Kunci: Social Problem, Corporate Social Responsibility (CSR), Social Agent
